title: HiDrive

scope_access.title: Access Scope
scope_access.description: Access permissions that rclone should use when requesting access from HiDrive

scope_role.title: User Role
scope_role.description: User-level that rclone should use when requesting access from HiDrive

root_prefix.title: Root Prefix
root_prefix.description: The root/parent folder for all paths. Rclone will use this as its starting point

oneOf.title: / - Topmost directory (root if using regular account)
root - Topmost directory of HiDrive user account
Empty - No root prefix (always specify full paths)

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Endpoint for the service (URL for API calls)

disable_fetching_member_count.title: Disable Fetching Member Count
disable_fetching_member_count.description: Do not fetch number of objects in directories unless absolutely necessary. Requests may be faster

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Chunk size for chunked uploads. Files larger than cutoff will be uploaded in chunks of this size

upload_cutoff.title: Upload Cutoff
upload_cutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload

upload_concurrency.title: Upload Concurrency
upload_concurrency.description: Concurrency for chunked uploads (number of chunks uploaded in parallel)

$comment: HiDrive uses OAuth authentication. File/folder names limited to 255 characters
